prodNameC: “恩奈格斯特”單純皰疹病毒IgG抗體 檢驗試劑
ingredientsDesc:
(1) Enzygnost Anti-HSV/IgG Test Plate(2pcs): Microtitration plate coated with inactivated HSV Ag.
(2) Anti-Human IgG/POD Conjugate(1 ×1mL): F(ab)’ fragment of rabbit Ab to human IgG, conjugated with peroxidase, in TRIS/HCl buffer with polygeline and dye(patent blue, tartrazine), preservative(phenol≦1g/L).
(3) Conjugate Buffer Microbiol (4 ×12.5mL): EDTA in phosphate buffer with Tetronic and BSA and preservatives (gentamicin: ~100 mg/L, 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazole-3-one: ~6mg/L, 2-methyl-4-isothiazole-3-one: ~2mg/L).  
(4) Anti-HSV Reference P/N(1 ×0.4mL): human serum containing IgG Ab to HSV Ag in TRIS/HCl buffer with Humanalbin and preservatives (amphotericin B: ~5 mg/L, gentamicin:~100 mg/L).
(5) Sample Buffer POD(2 ×50mL): TRIS/HCl buffer with Tween 20, polygeline and bovine serum and preservatives (amphotericin B: ~5 mg/L, gentamicin: ~100 mg/L).
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 定性及定量檢測人類血清與血漿中單純皰疹病毒（HSV Type 1及2）之特異性IgG抗體的酵素免疫分析法。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3305 單純皰疹病毒血清試劑
